name: Sky Pilot Fighters
description:
Fly over 20 different air combat battlefield missions, use your fly skill as a fighter plane pilot, make big fights maneuvers to keep your target locked so you can aim and shoot the enemies planes out of the air. Explode all the enemy helicopters.

Features:
- Fun action-packed combat target flight game
- Easy controls using on screen steering
- Great 3D flights missions, take part in 20 different combat battlefield operations
- Great airplane physics, fly your fighter plane in this ultimate 3D flight simulator
- Realistic 3D cockpit and controls
